name: Zookeeper Zach
description:
1. Feed the animals
  2. Animals collect money for you
  3. Profit?

Use the arrow keys to move Zookeeper Zach around.

Use the Control key to pick up and plant berry bushes.

Bushes bear more fruit on soil than on sand.  On their way to feed, the animals will collect any dots (money €€€) lying on their path. Each animal has a unique AI. 

Good luck! My high-scores are 1300 for game mode 1 and 1100 for game mode 2.

============================================

THE ANIMALS

ALFRED is a picky eater. He tries to get the biggest berries before everyone else.

BETTY is a greedy type. You often find her where many bushes grow next to one another.

CHARLIE is the lazy one. He usually goes to the closest source of food.

DIANA is the shyest of the bunch. She prefers to eat alone, far away from the others.
